headline.main: David Yates Narrates a Scene From ‘Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them’

keywords.value: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (Movie)

snippet: The director discusses a sequence where Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne) loses track of one of his beasts in a bank....
